description: Discover IBM's journey in blockchain technology, emphasizing its contributions to the Hyperledger project and enterprise solutions. Learn about IBM's strategic initiatives in areas like DeFi and supply chain management.
keywords: IBM, Blockchain, Hyperledger, Enterprise Solutions, Hyperledger Fabric, IBM Blockchain Platform, DeFi, Multi-cloud, Supply Chain, Finance
title: Exploring IBM's Blockchain Journey: From Hyperledger to Enterprise Solutions
